# Medical Diagnosis Platform - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack medical diagnosis platform with patient portal and doctor admin dashboard.

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- Frontend: React (Patient Portal)
- Admin: React (Doctor Dashboard)
- Authentication: JWT
- AI: OpenAI GPT API
- File Upload: Multer

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/patient-portal` - React app for patients
- `/admin-dashboard` - React app for doctors

## Development Guidelines
- Use Korean for user-facing content
- Follow REST API conventions
- Implement proper error handling
- Secure patient data with authentication
- Validate all inputs
